entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
